sourcesContent:
import React from "react";

const CollectionContext = React.createContext({
  contract: null,
  totalSupply: null,
  collection: [],
  nftIsLoading: true,
  tempCollection: [],
  loadContract: () => {},
  loadTotalSupply: () => {},
  loadCollection: () => {},
  updateTotalSupply: () => {},
  updateCollection: () => {},
  updateOwner: () => {},
  setNftIsLoading: () => {},
  loadCollections: () => {},
});

export default CollectionContext;
